name: 𝔟𝔞𝔩𝔱𝔦𝔰
description:
𝔟𝔞𝔩𝔱𝔦𝔰 is based on Baltis Vallis, a big channel running through the planet Venus. once thought to be a river of lava, the animation tries to represent the viscosity of it would have.

this is part of my 𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐯𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 collection. it combines my love for space & astronomy, with an abstract monochrome art style. every artwork is a satisfying infinite loop of motion.
